EmailTemplate.name: TT: Generic FS
EmailTemplate.subject: You are a candidate for the {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Publication_Year__c} Five Star Investment Professionals Award!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Informalname__c},
You have been identified as a candidate for the {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Publication_Year__c} Five Star Investment Professionals award! An exclusive group of professionals (including CPAs, estate planning attorneys, insurance professionals and financial planners) will receive the {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Publication_Year__c} award and be featured in a special {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Month__c} {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Issue_s__c} of {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Magazine__c}.
As a candidate, we need additional information in order to evaluate you based on our 10 objective criteria and move you forward in the research process. The deadline for submission is end of day {!Opportunity.ACDF_Deadline__c}.
To submit your information, please go to the secure, online link below and complete the form questionnaire. This only takes a few minutes of your time to complete.
Please click here to complete your candidate form.
Evaluation Process: Candidates will be evaluated on 10 criteria aligned with providing quality service to clients. Only those candidates who differentiate themselves based on the criteria will be named a {!Opportunity.Email_Templates_Publication_Year__c} Five Star Investment Professionals. Our 10 evaluative criteria include client retention rates, education and professional designations, a consumer complaint history review, industry board certifications and six other important criteria.
Award winners are scheduled to be notified 4-6 weeks after the deadline date posted above.
{!User.Name} Research Representative
Five Star Professional 2900 Lone Oak Parkway Suite 120 Eagan, MN 55121 Direct: {!User.Phone} Main: 1-888-438-5782 Fax: 651-259-1940 {!User.Email} http://www.fivestarprofessional.com
We exist to define and promote professional excellence.
